packets.DiscussionFirstDone: Dear #01, Thank you for your time for Detailed Dashboard Discussion today. You can connect with me for any assistance required on the same
packets.DiscussionFirstNotDone: Dear #01, We request you to provide time for DASHBOARD Discussion as per your convinience as we could not have the same done today.

packets.IdeasCampaignDiscussionNotDone: Dear #01, Request you to provide an alternate time for Campaign Discussion as per your convinience as we could not have the same discussed today. Please note we can plan for the campaigns post our discussion only
